title: Gimme, Heaven
description:
... The moment he has contact with the person he loves, he "disappears".
Masaki, a sommelier that works at a Bistro, lives together with his lover Kairi, a theatrical actor. Even though they both love each other deeply, there's an obstacle getting in the way of their relationship. And that's the fact that Kairi has multiple personalities...
Each time they are about to have sex, one of Kairi's personalities pops out, preventing them from having sexual relations.
Masaki is against the wall since all he wishes is to take care of Kairi, but the desire of wanting to hold him is equally strong... But Kairi has a severe trauma when it comes to sex...?
